name: Environmental Protection Agency (EPA)
description: Comprehensive resource providing information on various environmental issues and initiatives by the United States Environmental Protection Agency.

name: World Wildlife Fund (WWF)
description: Focuses on global conservation, working towards the protection of endangered species and their habitats.

name: Greenpeace
description: An international environmental organization that campaigns on various issues, including climate change, deforestation, and ocean pollution.

name: National Geographic Environment
description: National Geographic's section dedicated to environmental news, articles, and educational resources.

name: UN Environment Programme (UNEP)
description: Works towards sustainable development through promoting environmental protection and conservation efforts globally.

name: The Nature Conservancy
description: A leading conservation organization focusing on protecting lands and waters around the world.

name: Environmental Defense Fund (EDF)
description: Focuses on solving critical environmental problems through science, advocacy, and collaboration.

name: NASA Climate Change
description: Provides scientific information and data related to climate change, including research findings and educational resources.

name: Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC)
description: Assesses scientific information on climate change and provides reports to support policymakers in addressing this global challenge.

name: The Sierra Club
description: A grassroots environmental organization focused on protecting communities, wild places, and the planet.

name: Union of Concerned Scientists (UCS)
description: Conducts research and advocacy to solve pressing environmental and social issues.

name: Environmental Working Group (EWG)
description: Provides information on environmental health, including research and consumer guides on products and pollutants.

name: Conservation International
description: Focuses on protecting biodiversity hotspots around the world and promoting sustainable development.

name: Rainforest Action Network (RAN)
description: Campaigns to protect tropical rainforests and the rights of their inhabitants.

name: Global Footprint Network
description: Provides tools and resources for measuring and managing ecological footprints to promote sustainability.

name: Earthjustice
description: A nonprofit environmental law organization focusing on litigation to protect natural resources and wildlife.

name: The Guardian Environment Section
description: The Guardian's environmental news section featuring articles, opinion pieces, and investigative reports.

name: The New York Times Environment Section
description: The New York Times' coverage of climate change and environmental issues.

name: Environmental News Network (ENN)
description: Provides daily environmental news articles covering a wide range of topics from around the world.

name: National Resource Defense Council (NRDC)
description: Works to safeguard the earthâ€”its people, its plants and animals, and the natural systems on which all life depends.
